subject: Re: Axiom - Progress Update

Hi Reinhard,

We have updated the available request. You can check the site and excel file
https://staging-axiom.kinsta.cloud/
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1r_elSgRN8PqI6mKVOoja7Hl1BFdzq6kiARoCZ9ToWJA/edit#gid=1387737711

Hi Heath

I have now reviewed the changes in the document and added my comments. Please have a look and let me know if you have any questions.

Kind Regards,

Reinhard Kirchner
Studio Lead
+61 415 413 406
Brand chemistry

brandchemistry.com.au

Hi Heath

Thanks for letting me know, I will check in the morning.

Kind Regards,

Reinhard Kirchner
Studio Lead
+61 415 413 406

brandchemistry.com.au

Hi Reinhard,

We have finished the available updates on the excel document.

Hi Heath

I'm going well thanks!

Just letting you know i have updated the client feedback form and more images was added by the client.


Kind Regards,

Reinhard Kirchner
Studio Lead
+61 415 413 406
Brand chemistry

brandchemistry.com.au

Ok cool, thanks Reinhard, we will upload the new ones in the meantime. 

Hope you are well and speak soon.

Hi Heath thanks for checking in.

I have uploaded more outstanding gallery images and added the links in the client feedback doc, but there are still a few outstanding ones that we are waiting on from the client. Wanted to let you know once we have all of them available.



Kind Regards,

Reinhard Kirchner
Studio Lead
+61 415 413 406
Brand chemistry

brandchemistry.com.au

Hi Reinhard, 

We have tweaked the logo again and also added the contact us form to the bottom of the home page so you can view it. It's basically a script that loads an embedded form. It's quite long, but I know some business prefer this for better lead validation prior to first contact. Let us know what you think?

@heath Please see below

Logo - Still looking for a solution
https://staging-axiom.kinsta.cloud/ - Contact form

Hi Heath

I have gone through all the changes now and marked most as "Done". There are only two items left in the document:

1. Fuzzi logo - I left a comment in the document
2. Contact us form - What do you need from us in order to use the hubspot form (mentioned in sheet) in the contact us section at the bottom of some of the pages?


Kind Regards,

Reinhard Kirchner
Studio Lead
+61 415 413 406

Kind Regards,
